name: wildberry-princess
description: JavaScript library for abstracting out Google Analytics (analytics.js) and Kissmetrics.
author: Matthew Callis <Matthew Callis>

scripts.coverage: istanbul instrument --output build-coverage build/ && istanbul cover _mocha -- test/*_spec.js -R spec
scripts.test-phantomjs-ios: mocha-phantomjs --agent "Mozilla/6.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 8_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/536.26 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/8.0 Mobile/10A5376e Safari/8536.25" --setting localToRemoteUrlAccessEnabled=true --setting webSecurityEnabled=false test/index.html --hooks ./phantom_hooks.js --timeout 25000
scripts.test-phantomjs: coffee --compile --output test/ test/*.coffee && mocha-phantomjs --setting localToRemoteUrlAccessEnabled=true --setting webSecurityEnabled=false test/index.html --hooks ./phantom_hooks.js --timeout 25000
